channel.title: Go Humble! RSS BOOKS
channel.description: Awesome RSS Feeds about HumbleBundle books bundles!

item.title: Hellboy Universe Megabundle
item.content:encoded: Lose yourself in the renowned Hellboy comic series in this Megabundle from Dark Horse Comics! Get 25+ novels, comics, and graphic novels exploring the rich, dark, hilarious and action-packed world of the demonic superhero, Hellboy. This Megabundle features red hot Hellboy titles like Hellboy and the B.P.R.D: 1952-1956, Mike Mignola's Hellboy 2023, Abe Sapien Volume 1: The Drowning, and more! Explore the expansive Hellboy Universe and help support World Central Kitchen with your purchase!

item.title: The John Scalzi Collection: Old Man's War, The Interdependency, and More, by Tor Encore
item.description: Discover the worlds of John Scalzi
item.content:encoded: Immerse yourself in the rich sci-fi worlds of multiple Hugo Award–winning author John Scalzi! Explore themes of life extension, mortality, and humanity amidst the backdrop of alien war in the groundbreaking Old Man's War series, from first novel to its thrilling conclusion in The End of All Things. Also included are the mind-bending Lock In series, the sprawling Interdependency series, and beloved standalone novels like Redshirts—and much more! Pay what you want for this library of stellar sci-fi from one of the contemporary masters, and help support the work of First Book with your purchase!

item.title: Kodansha Award-Winning (& Nominated) Manga Encore
item.content:encoded: Get ready to discover your new favorite manga with this amazing bundle from Kodansha, full of fan-favorite titles that span the genres! In The Drops of God, you’ll witness the gripping human drama surrounding an inheritance battle over a wine collection worth millions. Nina the Starry Bride tells the captivating tale of an orphan turned princess navigating royal deceit and unexpected love. In Shangri-la Frontier, you’ll join a seasoned gamer as he faces formidable foes and mysterious figures in a captivating and deadly virtual world. Pay what you want for this incredible bundle packed with dozens of volumes and help support the Book Industry Charitable Foundation!

item.title: Tools for Data Engineers by Packt
item.content:encoded: Strengthen your skills and knowledge in data engineering with the Ultimate Data Engineer’s Cookbook Bundle of ebooks Packt. Inside this 20+ book library, you’ll get expert insights from courses like Data Governance Handbook, Databricks Certified Associate Developer for Apache Spark Using Python, The Ultimate Guide to Snowpark, and more. Deepen your understanding whether you’re a novice or a seasoned professional, and help support Coral Guardian with your purchase!

item.title: Your Wellness & Happiness Toolkit by New World Library
item.content:encoded: Learn to prioritize your wellness and happiness with our newest bundle from New World Library! Get ebooks like Career Self-Care, Healing with Nature, Say it Out Loud, and Panic Free. You are important and you’re worth treating yourself right—get the bundle that can help you become the best version of yourself. Plus, your purchase helps support World Central Kitchen!

item.title: The Magical Worlds of V. E. Schwab: The Invisible Life of Addie LaRue, The Shades of Magic series, and More
item.content:encoded: Dive into the imaginative worlds and captivating stories of #1 New York Times bestselling author V.E. Schwab with this literary bundle! This multi-book collection features bestselling titles like The Invisible Life of Addie LaRue, A Darker Shade of Magic, The Fragile Threads of Power, and more. Amazing modern fiction is being written every year—expand your personal library and discover some of the best new novels on the market. Lose yourself in this expansive collection, all while supporting The Trevor Project with your purchase!

item.title: Hacking 2024 by No Starch
item.content:encoded: Level up your hacking and cyber security skills with this bursting tech bundle from No Starch! Learn from top hacking courses like Hacks, Leaks, and Revelations, Windows Security Internals, Practical IoT Hacking, and more! Get 15+ guides and courses to help you better understand the intricacies of hacking so you can better defend yourself from future cyber attacks. Get professional level resources for both novice and seasoned hackers, and help support the Electronic Frontier Foundation and ACLU Foundation with your purchase!

item.title: Books About Games by Boss Fight Games
item.description: The ultimate library of video game history
item.content:encoded: Explore the detailed history, production process, and secrets of your favorite titles. This 30+ book collection features ebooks on gaming’s greatest games like GoldenEye 007: Deluxe Edition, Red Dead Redemption, Final Fantasy VI, Majora's Mask, and more from Boss Fight Books. This massive bundle will teach you about games that shaped the trajectory of the industry. Lose yourself in this expansive library, and help support Against Malaria Foundation with your purchase!

item.title: Free League RPG Mega Bundle
item.description: So many TTRPGs, so little time!
item.content:encoded: Gather up your party for endless adventure with this bundle of tabletop role-playing books from Free League Publishing! Our Free League RPG Mega Bundle features a wide variety of TTRPG games for you to enjoy with your friends. Get explorer’s kit contains rulebooks, sourcebooks, and campaign resources for Forbidden Lands RPG, Tales from the Loop RPG, Mutant: Year Zero, and more. Get everything you need to embark on an epic journey together and help support Direct Relief with your purchase!

item.title: Microsoft Certification Prep by Microsoft Press and Pearson
item.content:encoded: Learn the skills and knowledge you need to succeed on your Microsoft certification exams with this bundle of prep courses from Microsoft Press and Pearson. Inside this 20+ library, you’ll get expert insights from courses like Exam Ref AZ-900 Microsoft Azure Fundamentals, 3rd Edition, Exam Ref AZ-104 Microsoft Azure Administrator, 2nd Edition, Exam Ref MS-102 Microsoft 365 Administrator, and more. Deepen your understanding whether you’re a novice or a seasoned professional testing for your Microsoft certifications. Get this great bundle and help support Hello World with your purchase!

item.title: Scythe and More by Neal Shusterman
item.content:encoded: Explore the worlds and stories of Neal Shusterman! This 15+ book collection is highlighted by Shusterman’s standout novel Scythe—a gripping depiction of a world free of death. Other top titles include Dry, Toll, Thunderhead, and more from one of young adult fiction’s most renowned authors. Lose yourself in this expansive library, and help support the charity of your choice with your purchase!

item.title: A Wizard of Earthsea and More by Ursula K. Le Guin
item.description: Magical titles for your home library
item.content:encoded:
Explore the worlds and stories of author Ursula K. Le Guin with another great Humble Book Bundle! This 25+ book collection features A Wizard of Earthsea, Tehanu, Tales from Earthsea, and more from one of speculative fiction’s most renowned authors. Your purchase helps support Literary Arts, a nonprofit located within Le Guin’s community. Lose yourself in this expansive library today.

The titles in this bundle are available on Kobo.com. To access them, create or log in to your Kobo.com account. Please note that the content redemption deadline is December 15, 2027 at 11:00 AM PDT.

item.title: Pathfinder Second Edition "Happy Birthday, Remaster!" Bundle from Paizo Inc.
item.description: Be the legendary hero of Golarion
item.content:encoded: Gather your friends for endless adventure with the Ultimate Pathfinder Second Edition Bundle from Paizo Inc.! Experience the best way to play Pathfinder with this amazing bundle, which includes rulebooks, new scenarios, a bestiary, flip-mats, and campaign resources for Pathfinder GM Core, Pathfinder Second Edition Beginner Box: Remastered Edition, and Pathfinder Player Core, and more. Tabletop RPGs have never been this fun—get everything you need to embark on an epic journey together while supporting ComicBooks For Kids! with your purchase.
